column4: hello. i was wondering if it's possible to resize my linux partition while using it?
beplaut: i dont know what to do then. I tried a Knoppix live cd and tried to partition but that didn't work. and Windows wont let me do it either.
i dont know what to do then. I tried a Knoppix live cd and tried to partition but that didn't work. and Windows wont let me do it either
